Variables - DataTypes - Class - __init__: __init__ method in Python is used to initialize objects of a class. It is also called a constructor.
CICD - Bundling - Packaging - Managers -: conda, an open source environment manager to manage dependencies for Python.
CICD - Bundling - Arch - Functions - def: In Python a function is defined using the def keyword: def my_function(): print('Hello from a function')
CICD - Bundling - Arch - Functions - pas: The pass statement is used as a placeholder for future code.
CICD - Bundling - Arch - Functions - dec: In Python, a decorator is simply syntactic sugar for applying a higher-order function to another function.
CICD - Building - Cython: Cython is a Python compiler that makes writing C extensions for Python as easy as Python itself.
